TopicTitle: ERROR after a re-install of steam after sytem reset

Articles.Content:
Hi Kerbanaughts

Shortly after purchasing loading and registering kerbal 2 with steam, I had to reinstall windows. and all of my other programs.  I used steam to reinstall Kerbal 2  BUT when I hit play it sends me to private division site and I re logged onto it saved all my former information. But still the same thing game wont load. Now on private division it asks to purchase game?  Am I missing some step like using the steam key once again somewhere on Steam or Private Division

Any Tips to figure tis error out?
